name: Mandala Keichizoku
overview: Mandala Keichizoku is a mahjong game that includes two modes of play: story and versus. The story mode puts the player in the role of a brave warrior named Shou, who ventures towards the mysterious tower, the kingdom's most sacred site; there, he encounters a cute female android who tells him that he will have to compete against various magical creatures in the game of mahjong if he wishes to obtain the treasure hidden within the tower. The player proceeds to face various female opponents in a pre-set order; in the versus mode, the player is free to choose the opponents. Winning mahjong games leads to erotic scenes featuring the opponents.
